definitions: To lightly touch or stroke (a person or part of the body) in a way that causes a tingling sensation and often laughter.
To have a slight, irritating sensation in a part of the body, especially the throat, that makes one want to cough or scratch.
examples: She tried to tickle him, but he was too quick.
The idea of a vacation really tickles me.
My throat started to tickle, signaling a cold.
